mapper.update: UPDATE board_like bl JOIN board b ON bl.board_num = b.board_num SET bl.like_status = CASE WHEN bl.like_status = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, bl.like_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, b.board_like = b.board_like + (CASE WHEN bl.like_status = 'Y' THEN 1 -- 기존이 'Y'면 좋아요 취소 (감소) ELSE -1 -- 기존이 'N'이면 좋아요 추가 (증가) END) WHERE bl.like_id = #{like_id} AND bl.board_num = #{boardNum} AND bl.user_email = #{user_email};
